thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com | 2 of 212
thread.title: Emma D

author: Emma D
title: Emma D
text: I accessed this course to support me in preparing food for charity events. I found the course easy to access and very informative, I was able to work at my own pace and revisit areas when I needed to. The information was presented in a creative way and so it kept my attention. However, in one module (4) the information buffered and I was not able to complete the module. I reported this to the technical team but no one got back to me about it. I am unaware how much information I missed because of this. Otherwise a great product and I shall continue to view the website to see if there are any other courses I am interested in.
